ToolDescription:

RTutor is an AI-based app that can quickly generate and test R code. Powered by API calls to OpenAI's Davinci (ChatGPT's sibling), RTutor translates natural languages into R scripts, which are then executed within the Shiny platform. An R Markdown source file and HTML report can be generated.
Check out the github repo here: https://github.com/gexijin/RTutor
ToolShortDescription: Quickly generate & test R code, powered by OpenAI's Davinci & Shiny.

ToolDescription:
Open Source GPT -3 Powered CLI
The current prompt length is ~840 tokens and the pricing for text-davinci-002 is $0.02 for 1K tokens which is ~$0.017/command. We'll see if we can improve the response as well as reduce the per-command-cost with fine-tuning.
ToolShortDescription: Open source GPT-3 CLI, improving response & cost.

ToolDescription: Civitai is the only Model-sharing hub for the AI art generation community! Free to use, open source, and continually improving.
